content:
Does IBM FHIR have any support for the FHIR Mapping Language?

I'd like to take some input FHIR resources and combine them with FHIR mapping rules to extract a set of values from the input. So far I have been writing FHIRPath by hand, but was wondering if any code exists to support using mapping files instead.

Thanks!
@John Timm were you able to attend any of the FHIR Mapping Language sessions at devdays? Any good open source options?

Folks from Firely demonstrated FML support in Vonk. The only open source option I'm aware of is what's in HAPI. I think we should discuss what it would take to adapt the FHIRPathPatch work you did to support structure maps that contain FHIRPath expressions.
